text.mail-subject: Your access token to your account

text.user-has-no-videos: User {name} has not booked any videos
text.token-was-renewed: The token was updated because it had expired.
text.what-is-the-token-good-for: What is the token used for?
text.a-token-is: A token is a cryptic string with encrypted (login) information.
text.you-cant-revert-deletion-of-user: This action can not be undone!

copy-link.text: Use the Copy button to save the link to the clipboard. You can than paste the Link into an email.

send-link.text: Depending on the configuration of your browser, an email is generated, ready to be sent to the user.

test-magic-link.text: By clicking the Magic Link, you sign into the relevant user account.

messages.permanently-remove-user: {name} will be permanently removed. Confirm pressing OK
messages.video-available-until: This class will be available for you until {date}
messages.transfer-token-reminder: Remember to send the new token to the user {name} .
messages.you-will-be-logged-out: If you continue, you will be logged out of your current session.
messages.login-will-fail: Logging in as {name} will fail. The following actions must first be carried out:
messages.class-has-active-time-slot:
This course has an active time slot.
Remove {title} anyway?
messages.content-inaccessible:
The user {name} can currently not access the content he has booked.

To make the content available, the following actions must be taken:
messages.deactivating-token-locks-account: Deleting the token will lock the account!
messages.previous-token-will-be-discarted: The previous token will be discarded!
messages.validity-of-the-token:
The validity of the token is based on the booking end of the latest video. 
If no videos are currently booked but a new token is requested, it is generally valid for 30 days.
messages.every-token-owner:
The owner of the token automatically has access to stored user data, including booked content. 
You should therefore handle the token with care and never pass it on to third parties.
messages.usage-of-the-button:
Use the {button} button to create a magic link . This will also automatically activate the account. The validity of the generated token is automatically based on the Booking duration of the last expiring video.

Please note that if you book additional videos , a new token must urgently be generated and handed over. This is the only way to ensure that the user can log into the portal for the entire booking period. If a token has expired, conventional registration using the registration form is no longer possible. In this case, any content that is still active can no longer be used by your customer!

Make sure that your clients are in possession of the current token at all times. To a certain extent, it is the key to the booked content.
messages.misusage: What should I do if I suspect that the token has been misused?
messages.generate-a-new-token: In this case, generate a new token using the {button} button. All previously generated tokens will become useless as a result.
messages.use-remove-token-button: Use the {button} button to lock the account. Alternatively, you can also click on Deactivate User . In both cases, registration is no longer possible.
messages.what-is-the-token-used-for:
The token is used for user authentication. 
This means that the usual erroneous typing of the user name / password is no longer necessary and you can start immediately. 
The token contains encrypted parameters such as the period of validity or user name. 
If an assignment can take place server-side, the corresponding user will be logged in.
